text: ۞وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُواْ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابَ

translation.en: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber
translation.id: Dan apakah telah sampai kepadamu berita orang-orang yang berselisih ketika mereka memanjat dinding mihrab
